column4: how can i install older packages? I want to roll back evolution and evolution-exchange to the 8.10 version (2.24 i believe) but cant figure out how to do it
it doesnt state that there are any additional version available
I think you can add the 8.10 repositories to your /etc/apt/sources.list (also via your packagemanager) and select the proper version (force version)
thanks what is what I was looking to do :)
